title: System.DllNotFoundException Impossible to load DLL libSkiaSharp[BUG]
body:
Hello,
I am using VS2019 .NET Framework 4.7.2. I have through nuget package install `Oxyplot.SkiaSharp.Wpf` 2.1.0-Preview1 which download me `Oxyplot.SkiaSharp` 2.1.0-Preview1, `HarfBuzzSharp` 2.6.1.4, `SkiaSharp` 1.68.3, `SkiaSharp.HarfBuzz` 1.68.3, `SkiaSharp.Viewq.Desktop.Common` 1.68.3, `System.Buffer` 4.4.0, `System.Memory` 4.5.3 and `System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe` 4.5.2

Once I used on my XAML Oxyplot.SkiaSharp.Wpf, I have a exception thrown. 

XAML:
```
`<Window
    x:Class="OxyPlot.Development.Rostov.MainWindow"
    xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation"
    xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml"
    xmlns:d="http://schemas.microsoft.com/expression/blend/2008"
    xmlns:local="clr-namespace:OxyPlot.Development.Rostov"
    xmlns:mc="http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/markup-compatibility/2006"
    xmlns:oxySkia="clr-namespace:OxyPlot.SkiaSharp.Wpf;assembly=OxyPlot.SkiaSharp.Wpf" 
    xmlns:oxy="http://oxyplot.org/wpf"
    Title="MainWindow"
    Width="800"
    Height="450"
    d:DataContext="{d:DesignInstance Type=local:MainWindow,
                                     IsDesignTimeCreatable=False}"
    DataContext="{Binding RelativeSource={RelativeSource Self}, Mode=OneTime}"
    mc:Ignorable="d">
    <Grid>
        <oxySkia:PlotView
            Grid.Row="0"
            Grid.Column="0"
            MinWidth="100"
            MinHeight="100"
            HorizontalAlignment="Stretch"
            VerticalAlignment="Stretch"
            Model="{Binding Path=DataWeather.PlotModelData, Mode=OneWay}" 
    </Grid>
</Window>/>`
```

Design view :
```
`System.DllNotFoundException
Impossible de charger la DLL 'libSkiaSharp': Le module spécifié est introuvable. (Exception de HRESULT : 0x8007007E)
   à SkiaSharp.SkiaApi.sk_colorspace_new_srgb()
   à SkiaSharp.SKColorSpace..cctor()

System.TypeInitializationException
Une exception a été levée par l'initialiseur de type pour 'SkiaSharp.SKColorSpace'.
   à SkiaSharp.SKColorSpace.EnsureStaticInstanceAreInitialized()
   à SkiaSharp.SKObject..cctor()

System.TypeInitializationException
Une exception a été levée par l'initialiseur de type pour 'SkiaSharp.SKObject'.
   à SkiaSharp.SKObject.get_Handle()
   à SkiaSharp.SKNativeObject.Dispose(Boolean disposing)
   à SkiaSharp.SKPaint.Dispose(Boolean disposing)
   à SkiaSharp.SKNativeObject.Finalize()`
```

I don't know what I have to do in order to get it right. I have tried on a .NETCORE wpf application and it worked, but not in the .NET FRAMEWORK...
